abstract: The Justice Department has filed civil fraud charges in federal court in Los Angeles against Standard & Poor’s over its ratings of mortgage-related securities.
snippet: The Justice Department has filed civil fraud charges in federal court in Los Angeles against Standard & Poor’s over its ratings of mortgage-related securities.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department filed civil fraud charges late on Monday against the nation’s largest credit-ratings agency, Standard & Poor’s, accusing the firm of inflating the ratings of mortgage investments and setting them up for a crash when the financial crisis struck.
